content: प्रतिमा {%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> A creator, maker. --मा {@--1@} An image, a likeness, statue, figure, an idol; <ls>R. 16. 39.</ls> {@--2@} Resemblance, similitude; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘like, similar, or equal to’; देवप्रतिम, अप्रतिम &c.; गुगेः कृशानुप्रतिमात् <ls>R. 2. 49.</ls> {@--3@} A reflection, reflected image; मुखमिंदुरुज्ज्वलकपोलमतः प्रतिमाच्छलेन सुदृशामविशत् <ls>Śi. 9. 48</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">73</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 64</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 100.</ls> {@--4@} A measure, extent. {@--5@} The part of an elephant's head between the tusks. {@--6@} A symbol.
